text: Charles Wallis Haeger (September 19, 1983 – October 3, 2020) was an American professional baseball pitcher. He played for the Chicago White Sox (2006–2007), the San Diego Padres (2008) and the Los Angeles Dodgers (2009–2010) in Major League Baseball (MLB). He was born in Livonia, Michigan. On October 3, 2020, Haeger was found to have shot himself dead near the Grand Canyon in Arizona. He was the prime suspect in the shooting death of his ex- girlfriend, Danielle Breed, the day before. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Murder-suicides in the United States Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Suicide in 2020 Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States Category:People from Livonia, Michigan
title: Charlie Haeger
